relnotes.name: INTEGRATIONTEST

defect.title: testcertificates should not be delivered through CBR

relnotes.defect: Removed testcertificates as a part of CBR.

deliverystep.name: PREQ1269: Crypto Services: Plugin management and highly desirable features (Phase 2)
deliverystep.preq: 1) Post-manufacture plugin management 2) Complex queries in the SCR 3) Additional smaller requirements and changes and 4) Improved security in the SCR

deliverystep.name: PREQ2193 SMP-Safe Crypto Services Components
deliverystep.preq: Add SMPSAFE keyword in SDP mmp files

defect.title: SMP:tsilent_h2.script fail with -46

relnotes.defect: update testutil check file exists.

defect.title: SMP:Commdb configuration file is needed

relnotes.defect: Add commdb configuarion file for naviEngine and update the broken commdb configuartion file.

defect.title: SecurityTest.iby & SecurityTests_vFuture.iby need realigning for v9.6

relnotes.defect: SecurityTests.iby was modified to incorporate v9.6 ROM builds. SecurityTests_vfuture.iby was realigned with SecurityTests.iby.

defect.title: SMP::testutil server use async call to mount the file system

relnotes.defect: Mount drive synchronisely in testutil server.

defect.title: 'tinterpretsisinteg\runtest.pl' WINSCW tests fail on ONB due to 'fail.exe' call

relnotes.defect: Created a perl file which internally calls a batch file which runs the runtest.pl tests. This new perl is called from the test spec.

defect.title: Non-DP Roms can not build in ONB

relnotes.defect: Included rom dependencies for non-dp textshell rom and mcs

defect.title: BATS BREEZE SDP: Emulator network access issues using WinPcap

relnotes.defect: new configchangebats perl added to make use of environment variable when environement value available for MAC

deliverystep.name: PREQ1269: Crypto Services: Core Delivery
deliverystep.preq: Delivers the main set of features for the Diran Early Phase. Includes the new components (SCR, SIF and STS), migration of the native installer to use the new components and most reference code. Excludes non-mandatory features and post-production plugin management.

defect.title: panicscan.pl & panicscan_authserver.pl need aligning to prevent failures

relnotes.defect: Have added a new label "UptoMCL" to test_spec to separate out the panicscan.pl and panicscan_authserver.pl test ,now for vFuture tests only panicscan_authserver.pl would run. Also added the missed out panics from panicscan.pl to panicscan_authserver.pl.

defect.title: Export restricted issues in security_cryptospi_strong and security_testframework

relnotes.defect: Distribution policy corrected in security_cryptospi_strong and security_testframework to reflect the correct changes.

defect.title: Symbian, CX500DistinguishedName::ExactMatchL fails if DNs contain unsupported at

relnotes.defect: Add support for the PKCS#9 unstructuredName attribute

defect.title: Fix copyright errors

relnotes.defect: Copy Right headers has been added in the files.

deliverystep.name: EC062: Harmonise Security and SymbianSigned PC Tools libraries

relnotes.deliverystep: Refactoring makesis, signsis, dumpsis and interpretsis into libraries so that the code duplication can be avoided. This will also improve the maintenance of the code.

defect.title: makesis -c option

relnotes.defect: InterpretSIS now supports SIS upgrades, HAL attributes and file options. The -c command has been updated to reflect this.

defect.title: Provide Test Cases for PDEF125098

relnotes.defect: Added test cases for case sensitive / case-insensitive comaprison of distinguished names in different encodings.

defect.title: Makesis can confuse filenames with wildcards with run-on-install exes

relnotes.defect: Removed error in parsing code that caused the RI flag to be mixed with previous FN flags. This caused makesis to reject wildcardFileNull lines with 'invalid path' errors.

defect.title: Unnecessary inclusion of GPL tool in security testframework source

relnotes.defect: Exports folder has been deleted from the common\generic\security\testframework\test\.

deliverystep.name: Security - Alignment of CBR and System Model components

preq.title: Alignment of CBR and System Model components

deliverystep.preq: OSD and IPR category are modified fro sntpclient.

defect.title: Clean up build's tagscan errors

relnotes.defect: Remove tagscan errors.

defect.title: Master build specs refer to ChrisDa's personal branch

relnotes.defect: sntpclient is moved to testframework/test to remove the incorrect referance of chrisda’s personal branch in master build specs.

ec.title: Include an implementation of the MD4 hash function (IETF RFC 1320) in those provided by the Symbian Hash library (part of Symbian Security subsystem)

relnotes.ec: Added the MD4 Message Digest Algorithm(RFC 1320) implementation.

defect.title: runced.bat should not be stored in be under Generic\security\zepher

relnotes.defect: New version of some files added to security\testframework\test\autotesting from //PR/share/DABSRelease/buildscripts/projects/security/zephyr/

cr.title: Control ordering of uninstall RUNREMOVE action

relnotes.cr: Added integration tests for CR956 -Control ordering of RR action.

defect.title: OOM tests failing in JMI component

relnotes.defect: Fixed numerous problems under OOM.
relnotes.preq: TOOLS2 macro is added with TOOLS.

defect.title: Include all tests for Vfuture

relnotes.defect: All regression tests are included for future build
relnotes.preq: Changed according to filename policy to support the building of Symbian OS on both Windows and Linux for the test code.
Changed according to filename policy to support the building of Symbian OS on both Windows and Linux.

defect.title: Some tests are running repeatly in test_spec_9.3

relnotes.defect: test scripts duplication removed from test spec

defect.title: tpkcs5kdftests.txt regression

relnotes.defect: Removed tpkcs5kdftests.txt and added the test cases present in tpkcs5kdftests.txt to tpkcs12kdftests.txt.
relnotes.minorchange: Naiad Quality plan to improve the test coverage and to reduce the defect level in the production code

defect.title: Makesis & SWI assumes system drive is c:

relnotes.defect: Removed hardcoded references to C drive and replaced with system drive.

defect.title: bld.inf and distribution.policy missing from security directory in CBR

relnotes.defect: Top level bld.inf is added into CBR release

defect.title: Hardware tests result (integritychecktest.htm) is not copied to E drive(MMC)

relnotes.defect: Copied integritychecktest.htm to E:(MMC).

defect.title: 57: t_testhandler2 OOM test framework can go into an infinite loop

relnotes.defect: Infinite loop exited when any unknown error comes other than KErrNone and KErrNoMemory for OOM Test Framework.

defect.title: Remove SYMBIAN_PKCS12 #ifdefs from code

relnotes.defect: Removed SYMBIAN_PKCS12 #ifdefs from code.
relnotes.minorchange: Altered iby to ensure that platsec settings are put in the core image of the DP test roms
